WorkItem.Description:
The first time I load from battle.net a toon (Earthen Ring : tntree) it works fine. 
The Second time I go to the load screen it pre-populates the Realm and Toon name, which would be ok IF it didn't sneek in a "-" makeing it Earthen-ring  .... which will FAIL to load.

Comments.Message:
I'm seeing multiple issues when it comes to loading from battle.net due to users entering bad data, like only putting the first word in, or putting in an invalid server name.

I've now put measures into place on the dialog to fix that and found the root cause for the dash in the name and put a replace on it so it will store it as a space instead.
